message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $800,000. I think this is a fair price considering its value to you.
Hello Alice, thanks for the offer.  While I agree the product is unique, I'm thinking it's closer to $500,000 in value. Would that work for you?

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I think the product's value is higher than that. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $700,000. It's a fair compromise that still reflects its unique value to you.
I appreciate you working with me Alice.  While $700,000 is closer, I'm aiming for something closer to $600,000. Would that be agreeable to you?
I understand your persistence, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll meet you at $650,000, but that's as low as I can go. This is a one-time offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
